duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate lead qualification, nurturing, proposal development, negotiation, and deal closing in collaboration with pre-sales engineers, account executives, and project managers.
Manage end-to-end sales process, from lead qualification to deal closure, leveraging the BANT methodology.
Develop a strong understanding of custom software solutions, digital transformation strategies, and trends.
Meet and exceed sales targets and objectives as agreed upon.
Provide regular sales reports, updates, and insights to the management team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
